inference:
$\angle AGD = 180^\circ - 120^\circ = 60^\circ.$ 

$\angle DGE = x^\circ - 80^\circ.$

$m \angle AGD + m \angle DGE = 180^\circ$

$60^\circ + x^\circ - 80^\circ = 180^\circ$

$x^\circ - 20^\circ = 180^\circ$

$x^\circ = 180^\circ + 20^\circ = 200^\circ.$

Final Answer: $\boxed{200}$. I hope it is correct.
